title: All In
description: What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas...For poker star Vice Jackson, growing up in the City of Sin wasn't easy. With a childhood filled with an alcoholic mother, strange men in his living room, drugs, and endless nights on the strip, he meets his best friend Skip who turned his life around in one single afternoon. Skip brought Vice to be the hottest tattoo artist in all of Vegas. From the big money poker tourney's, all the sexy woman he could ever want, and a promising future at Mad Tatter, Vice was living the dream. Slowly, it all shatters, leaving Vice being harassed by Vegas high roller and drug dealer Chase Miller. Vice does his best to stay away from Chase as he knows that he is nothing but trouble. All the while letting the girl of his dreams -Harlow Jean- into his life. She is beautiful, down-to-earth, with a heart of gold, though she has been keeping a secret from Vice. A secret that moves the earth from beneath his feet. With every turn Vice Jackson takes, he realizes that with every choice he makes... there are consequences. Consequences that change his life, forever. Regardless... he's 'all in'. **18+ Explicit content. Mature audiences only. Drugs, language, and sexuality.**
author: Molly Bryant
